show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On todayâ€™s Connect the Dots, Alison Rose Levy will talk with Linda Bark, PhD, RN, the author of The Wisdom of the... <!--more--> Whole: Coaching for Joy, Health, and Success, who offers a unique way to link the emotions, body, and energy to build total wellness.
Dr Bark also trains people to be health and lifestyle coaches via her website, http://www.barkcoaching.com/
